issue.message: This call is to a method from API 23, the call containing class androidx.camera.testing.compat.LooperCompat is not annotated with @RequiresApi(x) where x is at least 23. Either annotate the containing class with at least @RequiresApi(23) or move the call to a static method in a wrapper class annotated with at least @RequiresApi(23).
